4.text: Here in Britain we don’t like to boast. And we're far too reserved and polite to shout about our plans for this autumn’s magnificent season of blockbuster cultural events in London.

12.text:
You see, we always take huge pride in 
our enormous modesty.

18.text: It would seem hardly fair to wax lyrical about our award-winning West End theatre, when we do have the finest actors to choose from.

26.text: And as for mentioning our show-stopping musicals, well I'm sorry but it's just not cricket.

31.text:
So, if you don’t mind we won't make a 
song and dance about our world-class ballet dancers.

36.text:
Our walls and walls of inspiring and 
groundbreaking art.

42.text: Or that thing on rollers. It’s a top secret Russian space capsule, but don’t tell anyone.

54.text: And while others may swoon over grandeur, we just take it in our stride.

58.text: Because for us pageantry is as commonplace, just like double decker buses or talking about the weather.

63.text: "Oh actually it's clearing up rather nicely. So please, do come and see us in London this autumn. It really is rather pleasant."
